episode_event_sina_dexio/4001_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] took Sina and Dexio
around town...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4001_1001_0300_: Our partner Pokémon seem to like Pasio as well!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4001_1001_0600_:
Oh! I was so drawn in by the Veevees, I didn’t
even realize I was walking over here.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4001_1001_0800_: Your friend is a little odd, isn’t she?
episode_event_sina_dexio/4001_1001_0900_: Your Sylveon is quite lovely, too!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4001_1001_1000_: R-really? I’m happy to hear that...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4001_1001_1100_: Oh, um. I’m Penny. I’m from the Paldea region...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4001_1001_1200_: What about you two with the Veevee partners?
episode_event_sina_dexio/4001_1001_1400_: Allow us to introduce ourselves too.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4001_1001_1600_:
My name’s Sina! A beautiful name for a
beautiful lady!
episode_event_sina_dexio/6801_1031_0100_:
If you ever need support,
leave it to me!
episode_event_sina_dexio/6801_1001_0100_:
I’ll support the younger Trainers the same way I
always support you, Dexio!
episode_event_sina_dexio/6801_1001_0200_: I’m sure we’ll succeed if we work together.
episode_event_sina_dexio/6801_1001_0300_: You and I are an invincible duo, after all.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_0100_: We’ve traveled all over Kalos and Alola.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_0200_:
And now, we’ve come to Pasio to see the sights
and test our skills.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_0300_:
We’re quite confident in our knowledge and
experience as Trainers.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_0400_: Why, a few years ago in Kalos...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_0500_:
Dexio and I were entrusted with Pokédexes by
Professor Sycamore!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_0600_:
You could call us Pokémon-voyage veterans—and
mentors to Serena and her friends, who’re also
from Kalos.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_0800_:
So far, we’ve mostly been using our experience
to support new Trainers.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_0900_:
But now, we’d like to challenge ourselves to
something new on Pasio!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_1000_:
We still don’t know what exactly we’d like to
do, though.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_1300_:
I had a lightbulb moment when I saw
Penny’s backpack!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_1500_:
Let’s hold a meet-and-greet for Eevee family
Trainers!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_1600_: I see... That could be interesting.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_1700_:
Here on Pasio, there are lots of Trainers who
have Eevee and its Evolutions as their sync pair
partners. Right, Penny?
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_1800_: Uh, yeah... I can think of a few people...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_2000_:
So let’s expand our network through our fellow
Eevee friends...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_2100_: and search for ways to help out on Pasio!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_2300_:
Then let’s spread the word about the
meet-and-greet!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_0401_2600_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] has a lot of
connections, so we’ll probably find people
in no time.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_0302_2700_:
Let’s gather as many people as
we can!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_0402_2800_:
Yeah! If we’re gonna do this, we might as well
get everyone we can.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_0402_2900_:
All those Veevees in one place... Sounds
heavenly... Hehe.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_3000_:
We’ll be taking our leave now! We need to get
ready—bon voyage!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4002_1001_3100_:
I look forward to seeing you again the day of the
meet-and-greet!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4003_1101_0100_:
News about the meet-and-greet spread in the
blink of an eye...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4003_1001_0300_: You’re going too, right, Kris? Let’s go together!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4003_1001_0400_: Yeah! I’ll be there with my Jolteon.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4003_1001_0500_:
Professor Sycamore, about the organizers of
the event...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4003_1001_0600_: Yes? What about Sina and Dexio?
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_0200_:
Penny and Eve, I’ve been so excited to see you
and everyone else at this meet-and-greet!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_0400_:
This meet-and-greet is the perfect excuse to see
you two.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_0500_:
We need an excuse to see each other?
That’s so sad...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_0600_:
We don’t need a reason to hang out! Just come
over anytime!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_0800_: She’s got point. Let’s hang out more from now on!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_0900_:
We should still go out and do things on days
there are no special events going on.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_1300_:
It’s OK if your partner Pokémon isn’t an Eevee or
Eevee Evolution!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_1400_:
I’m a little curious what kind of Veevee
[Name:PlayerNickname ] would bring, though.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_1500_:
By the way, I noticed both your partner Pokémon
are still Eevee.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_1600_: I guess you don’t wanna evolve them?
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_1800_: I want to be considerate of Eevee’s feelings.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_1900_:
And I just want her to evolve into whatever
she wants.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_2000_: I want the same for me!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4004_1001_2100_:
When Eevee evolves, I wanna evolve and
grow, too!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_0100_: You seem to be having a lot of fun today, Penny!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_0300_:
I’m on cloud nine with all these Veevees
around me...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_0400_: It’s like my own personal paradise!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_0500_:
And it’s all thanks to the organizers of this
meet-and-greet.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_0600_: The organizers were Sina and Dexio, right?
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_0700_: Oh, you all know each other?
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_0800_: Yeah, we met back in Alola.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_0900_: They came up to us saying they were tourists.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_1000_:
But it turned out they weren’t there just
to sightsee.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_1100_:
Apparently, Professor Sycamore asked them to look
into something!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_1200_:
Do you think they also came to Pasio for something
other than sightseeing?
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_1300_: I wonder... I guess we won’t know unless we ask.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_1400_:
Speaking of those two...I haven’t seen
them around.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_1500_:
I haven’t seen them for the entire
meet-and-greet, either.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_1600_:
Now that you mention, that girl dressed as
Eevee...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_1700_: I haven’t seen her for a while either.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_1800_: Hm, you’re right... Maybe she already went home?
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_0401_2000_: Oh, should we go look too, then?
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_0401_2100_: Yeah! I wanna know where they went.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_0402_2400_: Just to be safe, let’s split up and look for them.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4005_1001_2500_: If anyone finds them, spread the word!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4006_1001_0200_:
Were you looking for us because you were
worried?
episode_event_sina_dexio/4006_1001_0300_:
We had a little moment of panic, but we’re
all safe.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4006_1001_0500_: But we were able to stop them.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4006_1001_0600_: I’m just so relieved these two are OK.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4006_1001_0800_:
They’re so amazing. They organized the
meet-and-greet and even saved us
from danger...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4006_1001_0900_: But I... I couldn’t do anything to help.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_0200_:
Ugh, Team Break really are shameless
troublemakers. I’m glad you’re all OK, though.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_0300_: All right, then. I’ll leave the rest to you.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_0500_:
I couldn’t do anything to help him ’cause I’m
too weak...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_0600_:
It’s my fault he went through such a scary
experience...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_0700_:
I wasn’t sure yet what Eevee was gonna
evolve into.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_0800_:
But maybe I should have him evolve soon so he
can get stronger. Then he won’t be targeted
as easily...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_0900_: There’s no need to rush into a decision.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_1000_:
That’s right. Think carefully before you decide
what to do.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_1100_:
In the same way Eevee has many potential
Evolutions...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_1200_: you two have endless potential as a sync pair.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_1300_:
You could become the strongest sync pair
on Pasio.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_1400_:
Or Eevee could evolve into an unknown Pokémon
no one has seen before.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_1500_:
Potential like that is possible for those who face
themselves and their Pokémon head on.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_1600_: So it’s OK to take time to think this through.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_1700_:
Your Pokémon-voyage veterans are here for
you, too.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_1800_: That’s right! We’ll always be here for support.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_2200_: We’ll evolve into something only we can.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_2300_:
And become the strongest sync pair there
ever was!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_2500_:
Watching them made me realize what I’d like to do
on Pasio.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_2600_:
Oh? What a coincidence. Did you think the same
thing I did, Sina?
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_2700_:
The way Eve worried about her relationship with
her Eevee...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_2800_:
There must be other sync pairs on this island who
are going through the same thing.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_2900_:
We want to create a space where partners can
face each other and truly communicate...
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_3100_:
I’m sure it’ll be a lot of work, so we may ask you
to lend a hand, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_3300_: OK! Let’s become the ultimate team.
episode_event_sina_dexio/4007_1001_3400_:
We’ll stand by the sync pairs who are going
through a difficult time and give them all the
support we can!
